casebody.data:
No. 10-5539. David Elton Mandeville, Petitioner v. Paul K. Smeal. 562 U.S. 1057, 131 S. Ct. 641,

178 L. Ed. 2d 472,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9436. November 29, 2010.

On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit for further consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Mandeville, 11 A.3d 1009 (Pa Super. 2010).
